entry.title: New release for Colanode: v0.1.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Enhance context retrieval with author information and metadata
  • Refactor assistant library with improved context and document formatting
  • Enhance document metadata with database context and improve enrichment prompts
  • Improve document metadata retrieval and prompt formatting
  • Add support for specifying context nodes in AI assistant response
  • Add summary column and enhance search vector generation for embeddings
  • Simpler chunk summaries and metadata handling at response time
  • Add recurring jobs to check node and document embeddings
  • Updated docker compose file
  • Remove automatic assistant response job scheduling on node creation
  • Update packages
  • Fix height for commands
  • Fix table view cells overflow
  • Implement infinite loading for table view
  • Rerender layout on workspace change
  • Remove react router
  • Fix view fields memo

Full Changelog: https://github.com/colanode/colanode/compare/v0.1.1...v0.1.2

entry.title: New release for Colanode: v0.1.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Mark preview tab as opened in double click
  • Replace tippy with floating-ui in commander
  • Implement mentions
  • Make SMTP service optional
  • Refactor debuggers
  • Improve node references migration
  • Fix radar service for new node counter updates
  • Switch from express to fastify (https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/16)
  • Change server host

Full Changelog: https://github.com/colanode/colanode/compare/v0.1.3...v0.1.4

entry.title: New release for Colanode: v0.1.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Include immutable version and commit sha as part of server docker build https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/18
  • Send client metadata as headers on each request https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/19
  • Implement auth ip rate-limits as fastify plugin https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/20
  • Implement workspace delete https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/21
  • Fix a kysely warning on user list query https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/22
  • Update packages https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/23
  • Refactor and improve node cleanups on delete https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/24
  • Add desktop publish step for MacOS Intel https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/26

Full Changelog: https://github.com/colanode/colanode/compare/v0.1.4...v0.1.5
